title: Video: Plastic Flowers – In You I’m Lost
content:
With only two EPs and a few singles to their name, Greek duo Plastic Flowers have already gathered quite a loyal internet following, and with tracks like In You I’m Lost it’s not hard to tell why.

Raw and unbearably honest, their imagery may tick all the boxes for stereotypical hipster buzz band, but that’s irrelevant when the music is as good as this. This clip, recorded by senselens is a beautiful home-shot rendition of new track In You I’m Lost, a numbing and remorseful ballad that ends far too soon. Check it out below.

Plastic Flowers – In You I’m Lost from senselens on Vimeo.
